source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_00<tab>Hien is ready to undertake the challenge of Bardam's Mettle.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_00<tab>バルダム覇道前のヒエンは、試練に挑みたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_01<tab>If you are to participate in the Naadam and fight alongside the Mol, you must first be recognized as a warrior of the Steppe. To earn this honor, you will be required to complete a rite of passage involving walking in the footsteps of the legendary hero Bardam and taming a yol. Each member of your party must do this by themselves, of course, and so you shall...though if by pure coincidence some of your fellow adventurers happened to have made the long journey to the Far East, and simply <var 1A 02 /var>insisted<var 1A 01 /var> on accompanying you...surely no one would be any the wiser.

※Bardam's Mettle can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_01<tab>ヒエンの提案で、シリナたちモル族の一員として終節の合戦に臨むことになった。合戦への参加を認められるためには、バルダム覇道を越え、一人前の戦士であることを証明しなければならない。「伝統試練 バルダム覇道」を制覇し、その証として怪鳥ヨルを従えよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_02<tab>At the end of a strange and bewildering journey through Bardam's Mettle, you manage to tame a wild yol in the traditional fashion. Trial complete, you leave to rejoin your comrades.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_02<tab>バルダム覇道の最奥で、ヨルに力を見せつけた。バルダム覇道の入口へと戻ろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_03<tab>Lyse emerges from the pass not long after you do, her trial also complete. However, there is still no sign of Hien or Gosetsu...
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_03<tab>入口へと帰還したところ、リセも間もなく帰ってきた。バルダム覇道前の「リセ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_04<tab>Suddenly recalling the whistles entrusted to her by Cirina, Lyse brings them forth, handing one to you. With a blow, you summon your respective yols, which circle in the skies above in acknowledgement of your new bond. There can be no doubt: you are now warriors of the Steppe.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_04<tab>リセから笛をもらい、ヨルを呼んでみた。これで、終節の合戦の参加者として認められるはずだ。ヒエンとゴウセツも無事に帰還することを願おう。
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_00<tab>「伝統試練 バルダム覇道」を攻略
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_01<tab>「伝統試練 バルダム覇道」を攻略

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_000<tab><huff> <puff> This is it! The real trial!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Tread softly. We are for hallowed ground, and the kami are restless...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>ふむ……この先、確かに空気が違うでござる。
触れがたき神域の気配よ。
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_010<tab>では、これより「バルダム覇道」の試練に参る。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_011<tab>To complete the trial, we must each pass through Bardam's Mettle and tame a yol. How precisely we are to do this, I am not sure, but since countless warriors before us have succeeded, I imagine we'll muddle through somehow...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_011<tab>準備ができた者から突入し、
各自、怪鳥「ヨル」を従えて帰還してほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_012<tab>But enough talk! We have a Naadam to win!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_012<tab>これは、「終節の合戦」……
ひいてはドマ奪還までの通過地点だ。
ひとりも脱落せんよう、互いに心してかかろうぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_020<tab>First the trial, then the Naadam, then Doma, then Ala Mhigo! We'll be back home before you know it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_020<tab>ドマ奪還までの通過地点なら、
当然、アラミゴ解放にも続く道だよ。
さあ、全力で突破してこう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_025<tab>Quite frankly, if I cannot convince a large bird to follow me, then what hope do I have with the Xaela? Or my own countrymen, for that matter.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_025<tab>鳥ひとつ手懐けられんようでは、
ドマで待つ民に合わせる顔がないわ。
互いに、よい成果を持ち帰ろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>I have stood upon more battlefields than I can count and lived to tell the tale. No bird will be my downfall!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>拙者とて、かつては異国の山河を渡り、
幾多の戦場を駆け抜けたものでござる。
老いぼれと案じるには及ばん！

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_040<tab>I should've known you'd be the first to make it through.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_040<tab>やっぱり、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の方が早かったか。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_041<tab>I'm assuming you had no trouble? Good, good. I managed somehow, as you may have guessed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_041<tab>その様子だと、試練はバッチリみたいだね。
アタシの方も、どうにかこうにか。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_042<tab>Looks like Hien and Gosetsu are still in there, though. Nothing for it but to wait, then.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_042<tab>ヒエンとゴウセツは、まだ試練中かな……？
とりあえず、ここでふたりを待ってようか。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_050<tab>Oh, right. I've still got those whistles Cirina gave me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_050<tab>あっ、そうだ。
シリナから、鳥寄せの笛を預かってたんだった。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_051<tab>Here's yours. I suppose we ought to give them a try like she said.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_051<tab>はい、あなたの分。
さっそく鳴らして、ヨルが来るかどうか、
試してみようよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_053<tab>I think that means we've won them over. That one there is yours, right? The other one is mine. Awww...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_053<tab>ヨル、来てくれたよ！
ちゃんと、自分に勝ったアタシたちを認めてるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_054<tab>So that's that, then! We're officially warriors of the Steppe!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_054<tab>これで、文句なしに合戦の参加者だよね。
……がんばろう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
